sn44:1.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn44:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena khemā bhikkhunī kosalesu cārikaṃ caramānā antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca sāketaṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ vāsaṃ upagatā hoti.
sn44:1.1.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo sāketā sāvatthiṃ gacchanto, antarā ca sāketaṃ antarā ca sāvatthiṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ ekarattivāsaṃ upagacchi.
sn44:1.1.4: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn44:1.1.5: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, toraṇavatthusmiṃ tathārūpaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā jāna yamahaṃ ajja payirupāseyyan”ti.
sn44:1.2.1: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho so puriso rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā kevalakappaṃ toraṇavatthuṃ āhiṇḍanto nāddasa tathārūpaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā yaṃ rājā pasenadi kosalo payirupāseyya.
sn44:1.2.2: Addasā kho so puriso khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ vāsaṃ upagataṃ.
sn44:1.2.3: Disvāna yena rājā pasenadi kosalo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:1.3.1: “Natthi kho, deva, toraṇavatthusmiṃ tathārūpo samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā yaṃ devo payirupāseyya.
sn44:1.3.2: Atthi ca kho, deva, khemā nāma bhikkhunī, tassa bhagavato sāvikā arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
sn44:1.3.3: Tassā kho pana ayyāya evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
sn44:1.4.1: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena khemā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca:
sn44:1.4.2: “kiṃ nu kho, ayye, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?

sn44:3.1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:3.2.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?

sn44:7.7.11: ‘sassato loko’tipi, ‘asassato loko’tipi, ‘antavā loko’tipi, ‘anantavā loko’tipi, ‘taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīran’tipi, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipi, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipī”ti.
sn44:7.8.2: Yatra hi nāma satthu ca sāvakassa ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidaṃ aggapadasmiṃ.
sn44:7.8.3: Idānāhaṃ, bho gotama, samaṇaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ apucchiṃ.
sn44:7.8.4: Samaṇopi me moggallāno etehi padehi etehi byañjanehi tamatthaṃ byākāsi, seyyathāpi bhavaṃ gotamo.
sn44:7.8.5: Acchariyaṃ, bho gotama, abbhutaṃ, bho gotama.
sn44:7.8.6: Yatra hi nāma satthu ca sāvakassa ca atthena attho byañjanena byañjanaṃ saṃsandissati samessati na virodhayissati, yadidaṃ aggapadasmin”ti.

sn44:8.1.3: “kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sassato loko”ti?

sn44:8.2.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā?

sn44:8.2.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipī”ti?

sn44:8.3.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vā.
sn44:8.3.9: Tathāgato ca kho, vaccha, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho na rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, na rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, na attani vā rūpaṃ, na rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
sn44:8.3.13: na viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, na viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, na attani vā viññāṇaṃ, na viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.

sn44:9.1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44:9.1.2: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:9.2.1: “Purimāni, bho gotama, divasāni purimatarāni sambahulānaṃ nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ kutūhalasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
sn44:9.2.2: ‘ayaṃ kho pūraṇo kassapo saṅghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44:9.2.3: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44:9.2.5: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44:9.3.5: ayampi kho ajito kesakambalo saṃghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44:9.3.6: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44:9.3.8: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44:9.4.1: Ayampi kho samaṇo gotamo saṃghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44:9.4.2: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44:9.4.4: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tañca sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu na byākaroti:
sn44:9.4.6: Api ca kho naṃ evaṃ byākaroti:
sn44:9.4.7: ‘acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’ti.
sn44:9.4.8: Tassa mayhaṃ, bho gotama, ahu deva kaṅkhā, ahu vicikicchā:
sn44:9.5.2: Kaṅkhanīye ca pana te ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā.
sn44:9.5.3: Saupādānassa khvāhaṃ, vaccha, upapattiṃ paññāpemi no anupādānassa.
sn44:9.5.4: Seyyathāpi, vaccha, aggi saupādāno jalati, no anupādāno;
sn44:9.5.5: evameva khvāhaṃ, vaccha, saupādānassa upapattiṃ paññāpemi, no anupādānassā”ti.
sn44:9.6.1: “Yasmiṃ, bho gotama, samaye acci vātena khittā dūrampi gacchati, imassa pana bhavaṃ gotamo kiṃ upādānasmiṃ paññāpetī”ti?
sn44:9.6.2: “Yasmiṃ kho, vaccha, samaye acci vātena khittā dūrampi gacchati, tamahaṃ vātūpādānaṃ paññāpemi.
sn44:9.6.3: Vāto hissa, vaccha, tasmiṃ samaye upādānaṃ hotī”ti.
sn44:9.6.4: “Yasmiñca pana, bho gotama, samaye imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, satto ca aññataraṃ kāyaṃ anupapanno hoti, imassa pana bhavaṃ gotamo kiṃ upādānasmiṃ paññāpetī”ti?
sn44:9.6.5: “Yasmiṃ kho, vaccha, samaye imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, satto ca aññataraṃ kāyaṃ anupapanno hoti, tamahaṃ taṇhūpādānaṃ vadāmi.
sn44:9.6.6: Taṇhā hissa, vaccha, tasmiṃ samaye upādānaṃ hotī”ti.
sn44:10.1.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44:10.1.2: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:10.1.7: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
sn44:10.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando acirapakkante vacchagotte paribbājake bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:10.2.2: “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, bhagavā vacchagottassa paribbājakassa pañhaṃ puṭṭho na byākāsī”ti?
sn44:10.2.3: “Ahañcānanda, vacchagottassa paribbājakassa ‘atthattā’ti puṭṭho samāno ‘atthattā’ti byākareyyaṃ, ye te, ānanda, samaṇabrāhmaṇā sassatavādā tesametaṃ saddhiṃ abhavissa.
sn44:10.2.4: Ahañcānanda, vacchagottassa paribbājakassa ‘natthattā’ti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthattā’ti byākareyyaṃ, ye te, ānanda, samaṇabrāhmaṇā ucchedavādā tesametaṃ saddhiṃ abhavissa.
sn44:10.2.5: Ahañcānanda, vacchagottassa paribbājakassa ‘atthattā’ti puṭṭho samāno ‘atthattā’ti byākareyyaṃ, api nu me taṃ, ānanda, anulomaṃ abhavissa ñāṇassa uppādāya:
sn44:10.2.8: “Ahañcānanda, vacchagottassa paribbājakassa ‘natthattā’ti puṭṭho samāno ‘natthattā’ti byākareyyaṃ, sammūḷhassa, ānanda, vacchagottassa paribbājakassa bhiyyo sammohāya abhavissa:
sn44:10.2.9: ‘ahuvā me nūna pubbe attā, so etarahi natthī’”ti.
sn44:11.1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sabhiyo kaccāno ñātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
sn44:11.1.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yenāyasmā sabhiyo kaccāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sabhiyena kaccānena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44:11.1.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sabhiyaṃ kaccānaṃ etadavoca:
sn44:11.1.4: “kiṃ nu kho bho, kaccāna, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.1.7: “Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.2.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.2.3: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44:11.2.4: “Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44:11.2.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44:11.3.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.6: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.7: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.10: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44:11.3.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44:11.3.13: Ko nu kho, bho kaccāna, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ samaṇena gotamenā”ti?
sn44:11.3.14: “Yo ca, vaccha, hetu, yo ca paccayo paññāpanāya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjheyya.
sn44:11.3.15: Kena naṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā”ti.
sn44:11.3.18: “Yassapassa, āvuso, etamettakena ettakameva tampassa bahu, ko pana vādo evaṃ abhikkante”ti.
